title: Clarifying Direct Connection to Data
text: A direct connection to data means that your file pulls information in real-time or near-real-time from a live source system (e.g., databases, APIs). This allows for the most current data to be displayed in your file.

title: Understanding Data Updates
text: Data updates occur when changes are made to the source system or database your file connects to. In such cases, the file reflects these changes automatically once the data is refreshed.

title: Key Differences from File Updates
text: When you receive an updated file, you replace or exchange the entire dataset with new data. This is different from automatic updates via direct connection to the source system.
